name: Rise Up Chicken - Balloon Dash
description:
Rise Up Chicken Balloon Dash is one of the most challenging and fun games of 2018.

Protect the chicken in balloon with your shield while it’s rising up! Beware of the obstacles.
Move your shield with one finger to protect your balloon. Clear your way as you reach higher and higher!

Let the chicken rise up and up.

Shield control is very easy but it’s very hard to reach high scores!

Features of Rise Up Chicken Balloon Dash :
- Classic mode and challenge mode
- Free to play
- One finger control
- Different obstacles and experience every time
- Endless gameplay
